repo.name: openllmetry
repo.description: Open-source observability for your GenAI or LLM application, based on OpenTelemetry

readme.summary: Well-structured README with excellent quick start and installation guidance, but lacks in-depth examples, configuration details, and troubleshooting for the specific MCP instrumentation package.
readme.top_issue: The README is generic to the entire OpenLLMetry project rather than specifically documenting the opentelemetry-instrumentation-mcp package, which may confuse users looking for MCP-specific instrumentation details.

common_complaints: Library version compatibility issues (Weaviate v4, qdrant-client v1.16.1, OpenAI API changes)
Context management bugs causing trace corruption and data loss
Error logging not properly implemented for API failures
Missing instrumentation coverage for newer frameworks and API endpoints
sentiment.summary: Community shows moderate distress with unresolved compatibility bugs dating back to February 2024, slow maintainer response times on critical issues, and increasing integration challenges as dependencies evolve.
